name: 2.1-books-crud-operations
description: Create API EndpointsBooks CRUD OperationsGET /books - Retrieve all books. Implement pagination and filtering based on author or genre.GET /books/- Retrieve a specific book by its unique ID.POST /books - Add a new book to the collection.PUT /books/- Update details of a book by its ID.DELETE /books/- Remove a book from the collection by its ID.Data Validation & Error HandlingInput Validation:Use express-validator or Joi to validate inputs.Example validation for book creation:Title: Required, string with a max length of 100 characters.Author: Required, string with a max length of 50 characters.Year: Required, should be a valid number.Genre: Optional, string with a max length of 30 characters.Error Handling:Create a custom error handler for validation errors and 404 for invalid routes.Ensure the server responds with appropriate HTTP status codes (e.g., 400 for bad input, 404 for not found).
